meanings.sent1: The whare was beautifully decorated with traditional Maori carvings.
meanings.sent2: The whare is where the Maori community gathers for important ceremonies.
meanings.sent3: The whare looked cozy with its warm fire and comfortable seating.
meanings.sent4: The whare stood tall and proud, a symbol of Maori culture.
meanings.sent5: Visiting the whare gave me a glimpse into Maori traditions and lifestyle.

meanings.sent1: We need to whare all the guests coming for the event.
meanings.sent2: The hotel can whare up to 200 guests comfortably.
meanings.sent3: I will whare the stray cat until we find its owner.
meanings.sent4: Her heart was big enough to whare all the love in the world.
meanings.sent5: The garage can whare all our camping gear for the trip.
